title: Vatican synod ends with divide over women deacons and LGBTQ+
description: The most contentious topic at the month-long synod was how and whether to welcome LGBTQ+ Catholics.

title: Israeli troops push into Gaza for war’s ‘second stage,’ Netanyahu says
description: The announcement by Israel’s prime minister on Saturday appeared to signal the start of a sustained ground incursion into the Gaza Strip.

title: No text, no talk. Palestinians plunged into digital darkness in Gaza.
description: Gaza’s phone and internet connections were completely cut Friday night, leaving more than 2 million people with little or no ability to text, talk or scroll.

title: Hostage families say Israel operation in Gaza could endanger loved ones
description: As Israel expands its operation in Gaza, the family members of Hamas captives want to know how the government plans to keep the hostages safe.

title: In photos: The Israel-Gaza war in its third week
description: Israel is expanding its ground operations in the Gaza Strip after hours of intense airstrikes.

title: Israel-Gaza live updates: U.N. calls for ‘humanitarian truce’ as Israel expands ground activity in Gaza
description: The United States was among 14 member states that voted against the U.N. resolution, which the U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations criticized for not mentioning Hamas.

title: Russia and Ukraine intensify fight over Avdiivka, another ruined city
description: Russian forces are trying to encircle Avdiivka and clear a path on the eastern front toward Vladimir Putin’s goal of conquering the entire Donetsk region.

title: U.S., in policy switch, urges humanitarian pauses in Gaza
description: After weeks of declining to back international calls for “humanitarian pauses” in Israeli airstrikes, the Biden administration is now pressing Israel to agree.
